about_the_game: A small horror about a young man Stefan, whose life turns into a nightmare. Help him cope with the situation and understand what happened. The first 3 chapters are available in the demo.
detailed_description: A small horror about a young man Stefan, whose life turns into a nightmare. Help him cope with the situation and understand what happened. The first 3 chapters are available in the demo.
